Class AbstractAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snamp.AbstractAggregator

        • com.itworks.snamp.adapters.AbstractAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class AbstractAdapter
extends AbstractPlatformService
implements Adapter
    Represents an abstract class for building adapters.

      • exposeEvents

        public void exposeEvents(ManagementConnector connector,
                java.lang.String namespace,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AgentConfiguration.ManagementTargetConfiguration.EventConfiguration> events)
        Exposes monitoring events.

        In the default implementation, this method does nothing.

        Specified by:
        exposeEvents in interface Adapter
        Parameters:
        connector - The management connector that provides notification listening and subscribing.
        namespace - The events namespace.
        events - The collection of configured notifications.
